name: Staff of Shrieking
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Magic Items/Staves/Staff of Shrieking

Construction.Requirements: Craft Staff, shatter, shout, sound burst

sections.body:
Holes in this metal shaft cause it to emit an eerie moan when swung through the air. It allows use of the following spells:

  • shatter (1 charge)
  • sound burst (1 charge)
  • shout (2 charges)
sections.name: Description
